actions.committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Health and the Environment.

official_title: A bill to permit, under certain circumstances, the manufacture, sale, prescribing, and dispensing of the drug dimethyl sulfoxide (DMSO) in the State of Oregon and the importation into such State of such drug or any ingredient or intermediate thereof, including dimethyl sulfoxide compound or mixture thereof.

summary.text: Permits the manufacture, sale, prescribing, dispensing, or importation of the drug dimethyl sulfoxide (DMSO) in the State of Oregon, notwithstanding restrictions on new drugs under the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act.

titles.title: A bill to permit, under certain circumstances, the manufacture, sale, prescribing, and dispensing of the drug dimethyl sulfoxide (DMSO) in the State of Oregon and the importation into such State of such drug or any ingredient or intermediate thereof, including dimethyl sulfoxide compound or mixture thereof.
